claim_card.claim: Policy should move from scalar targets (inflation/GDP/unemployment) toward coherence dashboards tracking J(t), diffusion proxies D(J), core–edge ratio Jcore/Jedge, and coherence pressure Πecon.
claim_card.test_hook: Pilot a dashboard regime (even retrospectively); test whether it provides earlier warning and better intervention timing than scalar-target monitoring.
